document.full_text: cash-strapped belarus will receive a three-year $3 billion loan from a russia-led regional bailout fund as it seeks to stabilize its economy, prime minister vladimir putin's spokesman dmitry peskov said on saturday.
document.title: russia-led fund grants belarus $3 billion loan
lines_and_colors: cash-strapped belarus will receive a three-year $3 billion loan from a russia-led regional bailout fund as it seeks to stabilize its economy, prime minister vladimir putin's spokesman dmitry peskov said on saturday.
